diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts of Metaphysics.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    Metaphysics[Metaphysics] --> Ontology[Ontology Being]
    Metaphysics --> Causality[Causality]
    Metaphysics --> TimeSpace[Time and Space]
    Ontology --> Universals[Universals and Particulars]
    Ontology --> Substance[Substance]
    Causality --> Determinism[Determinism]
    Causality --> Indeterminism[Indeterminism]
    TimeSpace --> FreeWill[Free Will]
